feed.title: Category: affiliate marketing | Ong Swee San

entry.title: Clickbank direct deposit
entry.content:
Clickbank direct deposit is really great I got my paid out for March in 2 days and none of that expensive clearing fee. Comparing to my feburary cheaque payment, I receive it by mail last week and its still processing. I enjoying the shorter turn arond as now I have more funds to paly with. My latest paid out is about $600. Â 

The latest news from Clickbank, Now they do not allowing P2P products anymore. That means no more movies, music, PSP, iPod, Satellite TV for PC, Wii products.

entry.title: Landing page
entry.content:
Building a landing page can be very confusing. I have studied many landing page website recently, and found that these model works really well.

  1. Use attractive pictures to attract more users to research the title.

  2. Analysis of potential customers pain and problems with the current services or product.

  3. sell the benefits of product or service not the features.

  4. Using a large number testimonials.

  5. Money back guarantee.

  6. Give additional benefits for customers who make immediately purchase.

  7. Build an opt-in list, its takes 7 follow up to make a sale.

entry.title: Google Keyword Tool updated
entry.content: Now, when you use the Keyword Tool to search for relevant keywords to include in your keyword list, you'll be able to see the approximate number of search queries matching your keywords that were performed on Google and the search network, instead of the graphic bar.

entry.title: Clickbank test exceeds $100
entry.content: As of 1st of July my experiment with google cash concept exceeds $100. I am runnning one campaign, one keyword with 2 ads and one product. I will continue to the experience with a landing page and see how it goes.

entry.title: Clickbank finally offers Direct Deposit
entry.content: Clickbanks finally offers Driect Deposit but wait you have to meet all the requirements. To be eligible, an account must have first received three paper paychecks within any 90-day period. Additionally, only accounts in the following countries are eligible at this time: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, France, Germany, Ireland, Mexico, The Netherlands, New Zealand, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States. Dam!
